Setup DNS client (/etc/resolv.conf)

A basic DNS configuration is installed by the build process. Please change if the system is outside of Lincolnshire/NA.

  1. As we have multiple datacentres across thje globe, every site has it's own local DNS servers hence, please choose the site from one of the bewlow and go with the resolv.conf needed.
  2. Edit resolv.conf
    sudo vi /etc/resolv.conf
    • CDC - DRiV
      domain driv.com
nameserver 10.128.11.200
nameserver 10.128.11.201
nameserver 10.128.11.202
search driv.com amer.int.tenneco.com emea.int.tenneco.com aspa.int.tenneco.com cn.ten eu.ten na.ten fmmotorparts.com federalmogul.com
    • Lincolnshire Datacentre
      domain amer.int.tenneco.com
nameserver 10.32.8.53
nameserver 170.64.4.50
nameserver 170.64.216.180
search amer.int.tenneco.com na.ten eu.ten emea.int.tenneco.com aspa.int.tenneco.com cn.ten tenneco.com
    • Lincolnshire DMZ
      domain tenneco.com
nameserver 10.32.8.53
nameserver 10.0.4.50
search amer.int.tenneco.com na.ten eu.ten emea.int.tenneco.com aspa.int.tenneco.com cn.ten tenneco.com
    • Interexion(INT)
      domain  emea.int.tenneco.com
nameserver      170.64.216.180
nameserver      170.64.213.18
nameserver      170.64.108.18
search eu.ten emea.int.tenneco.com na.ten amer.int.tenneco.com cn.ten
    • Grass Lake(GLK)
      domain  amer.int.tenneco.com

nameserver      10.0.4.50
